scenario.title: Customer logging out of their online account

examples.step: Given Bob a customer is logged into his BGE online account with <validEmail> and <validPassword>
When Bob, logs out of his BGE online account
Then Bob, is out of his Bord Gais Account
Given Bob a customer is logged into his BGE online account with BGE123_0.rulez@gmx.net and password
When Bob, logs out of his BGE online account
Then Bob, is out of his Bord Gais Account

scenario.title: Customer logging out of their Bord Gais online account

examples.step: Given Bob, logged into his account with <validEmail> and <validPassword>
When Bob, logs out of his account
Then Bob, should be logged out of his BGE online account
Given Bob, logged into his account with BGE123_0.rulez@gmx.net and password
When Bob, logs out of his account
Then Bob, should be logged out of his BGE online account
